text: Hi all, i need to create a new blog template for the blog listing and blog singles. what is the best way to go? should i use the current default blogs and then modify them? what pattern should i follow if i need to bulld this  templates from scratch?? any ideas?
also i cant select another template besides the default ones

I was wondering what is the best way to "paginate" a Hubdb page ? I have an news page that is built using a hubdb module that shows all the news items on the page - you can view that page here: <https://accountants.sva.com/sva-news>. However the client would like to only show 10 news items per page.
is there a best way to do this?

There are many different ways this can be done (I think a few snippets may have been posted historically in the <#C22PDRW72|data-driven-content> channel. I would check out this <https://www.kelp.agency/blog/simple-hubdb-pagination>
(cc <@U7V9DQ31P> - as this is his writeup :slightly_smiling_face:)

Hi everyone HubSpot’s product team is exploring ways to *add app settings to the HubSpot UI for Marketplace-listed apps*. If this would benefit your app, we’d love to hear from you and discuss your use case. Please DM me if you’re interested!
• What: 45 minute call to discuss app settings
• When: calls will be scheduled over the next 1-2 weeks
